title: When you have dirk and caulfield's

replies.body: duskblade vision control is really powerful
Shoulda gotten a brutalizer, way more cost efficient and can build into one of the best items in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=SayoriWantsToDie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-10-19T03:28:09.929+0000)
>
> Shoulda gotten a brutalizer, way more cost efficient and can build into one of the best items in the game.

don't you bring up brutalizer now, I still miss that beautiful item
Lets all take a moment of silence for a truly missed friend. They had so much to live for and were brutally(heh) murdered by the corporate 1%.

Yoummus better

Drakhtar deals almost no dmg nerfed too much

> [{quoted}](name=Jax is carrying,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-18T22:34:51.900+0000)
>
> Yoummus better
> 
> Drakhtar deals almost no dmg nerfed too much

Nerf it more!!

> [{quoted}](name=Jax is carrying,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-18T22:34:51.900+0000)
>
> Yoummus better
> 
> Drakhtar deals almost no dmg nerfed too much

Lol only the late game damage was nerfed.

It still deals just as much damage early game, now with 3 extra Lethality on top of it.

#TheDuskbladeChangeWasABuff

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-10-19T06:51:09.808+0000)
>
> Lol only the late game damage was nerfed.
> 
> It still deals just as much damage early game, now with 3 extra Lethality on top of it.
> 
> #TheDuskbladeChangeWasABuff

It does less damage level 6 and on though? What type of god are you that you’re getting a duskblade prior to level 6?

> [{quoted}](name=Pierce The Veal,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2018-10-19T07:54:02.254+0000)
>
> It does less damage level 6 and on though? What type of god are you that you’re getting a duskblade prior to level 6?

The damage was only lowered by 15 at level 6.

The 3 bonus Armor Pen should easily make you deal this 15 damage you would be missing out on.

Hell, it might even deal more damage.
at this level is like 1 less armor so like 0.something % more damage

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=00000002000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-19T15:41:25.901+0000)
>
> at this level is like 1 less armor so like 0.something %  more damage

It's still more damage.

Ergo, it's a buff.

still not comparable to 15 damage,it will more likely be approximated to 0

and anyway you are not getting duskblade lvl 6 and even assuming you are that fed you don't need it  for oneshoting at this point

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=0000000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-19T15:44:13.443+0000)
>
> still not comparable to 15 damage,it will more likely be approximated to 0
> 
> and anyway you are not getting duskblade lvl 6 and even assuming you are that fed you don't need it  for oneshoting at this point

I just used lvl 6 as an example as it was what Pierce the Veal brought up.

he said it deals less damage after lvl 6 and he was right,if they remove 15 damage and then add like 1 or 2 damage it's still a 14/13 damage nerf (random numbers,idk how much damage 1 armor pen gives,but i hope you get the point)

and then he pointed out that you will never get it at 6

>What type of god are you that you’re getting a duskblade prior to level 6?

so you should compare its damage at higher levels

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=000000020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-20T11:08:47.890+0000)
>
> he said it deals less damage after lvl 6 and he was right,if they remove 15 damage and then add like 1 or 2 damage it's still a 14/13 damage nerf (random numbers,idk how much damage 1 armor pen gives,but i hope you get the point)
> 
> and then he pointed out that you will never get it at 6
> 
> so you should compare its damage at higher levels

I do not need to compare the damage at higher levels because it is obvious there's a difference in the higher levels.

It was the lower levels I was talking about, where I'm pretty sure the bonus 3 Armor Pen is equivalent to the 10-20-30's of damage you would be dealing off of the proc alone.
Duskblade has more lethality (+3) and auto vision control. Unless you REALLY need that MS, dusk blade.

If you build a Tiamat into Hydra like Talon, you won't need Duskblade. The attack reset from the Hydra active is about equivalent. Sweeper should always be built on assassins anyways in order to not rely too much on Duskblade's passive.

Youmuu's passive out of combat movespeed is better than level 1 boots. It's active helps you set up a kill or escape in a pinch. 

Plus movement speed is super valuable. Traversing the map getting picks and objectives is far more important than kills alone.

Edit: BUT This isn't a serious dicscussion. The meme is so true though haha!
No Talon builds into hydra early mid game

Speed or higher damage with vision control.

Depends on your champion.

DUSKBLADE!



if you are a nocturne player you will 100% agree with me

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Zeta 1313,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t7U6opbE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-19T02:22:25.469+0000)
>
> DUSKBLADE!
> 
> 
> 
> if you are a nocturne player you will 100% agree with me

Kha'zix and Kayn player here, always duskblade then GB.
yeah duskblade gives you more leathality (21 instead of 18) and procs whenever you khazix ult/noc ult/kayn ult

GB for that early roam strength and being able to go fast af boi

*Edit*

Love how every post saying GB is being downvoted. Guess differing opinions are wrong amirite?
Youmuu's first, every time. Who the fuck cares if you can one shot a squishy, if you're too late for every fight and the rest of your bonobo team is dead because you weren't there to carry?
youmuus, early game ms is powerful for chasing down enemies, especially in 1v1
youmoos 100%
